Chinese.Description: 游戏速度随持有时间加快，暂停和查看地图会使所有玩家眩晕，眩晕时长随暂停次数增加，解锁卡牌后在卡牌回收前随机获得一张正面卡牌

English.BuffName: The Eye Embracing the Past, Building the Future
English.Description: The speed of the game increases with the card holding time. Pause or using map will stun all players. The duration of stun increases with the number of pauses. After unlocking the card, a positive card will be randomly obtained before the card is recycled.
